roleset.name: to make an attack, criticize strongly
roleset.note: ATTACK-V NOTES: Member of Vncls judgement-33. (from attack.01-v)
ATTACK-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry attack.01, OntoNotes grouping attack-n senses 1-9; maps to VN class judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from attack.01-n)
ATTACKING-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from attacking.01-n)

roles.note: Noun roleset has both "instrument" and "attribute," where verb frame has only attribute because of gaming usages where game piece is "attacker." (from attack.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: `` Now , '' says [*T*-1] Joseph Napolitan , a pioneer in political television , `` the idea is [*]to attack first , last and always . ''

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mr. Baldwin is also attacking the greater problem : lack of ringers .
example.arg: the greater problem : lack of ringers

example.name: with cause
example.text: And [they]*-1 continue [*-1]anonymously attacking CIA Director William Webster for [*-2] being too accommodating to the committee .
example.arg: for [*-2] being too accommodating to the committee

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Over the past nine months , several firms , including discount broker Charles Schwab& Co. and Sears , Roebuck & Co. 's Dean Witter Reynolds Inc. unit , have attacked program trading as a major market evil .
example.arg: several firms , including discount broker Charles Schwab& Co. and Sears , Roebuck & Co. 's Dean Witter Reynolds Inc. unit ,

example.name: Args 1 and MNR
example.text: As early as move six , Mr. Kasparov deviated from a well-knownsequence of moves , developing a knight instead of making astandard bishop attack against the computer 's advanced knight .

example.name: NP only, Args 0 & 1
example.text: their attacks on program trading and its contributions to thestock market 's wild price swings
example.arg: on program trading and its contributions to the stock market 's wild price swings

example.name: MNR and Arg0
example.text: The president came under sharp attack from members of Congress for his foreign policy.

example.name: Arg 0 only in "by" PP
example.text: Small pets are subject to attack by these roaming nocturnal predators.

example.name: Metaphorical attack, illness
example.text: The new medication has reduced Sally's asthma attacks.

example.name: Metaphorical attack, Arg0 only
example.text: The student froze during the beginning of her piano recital from an attack of nerves.

example.name: Arg 0 as "of" PP
example.text: The hinge was weakened by an attack of rust.

example.name: With arg 2, invented
example.text: John's attack of capitalism as the root of all evil was not well-accepted at the Republican National Convention.
example.arg: as the root of all evil
